system.effect:
Select a Square within your Movement Range that lies directly between the source of the attack and the target of the attack. Make an Acrobatics or Athletics check; you may Shift a number of Meters equal to half the result towards the chosen square.
 if you reach the chosen square, you take the attack instead of it's intended target.
 
  ***Special: Pokemon must have Loyalty of 3 or greater to make Intercept Ranged Maneuvers and may only Intercept attacks against their Trainer. At Loyalty 6, Pokemon may Intercept for an Ally
system.trigger: A Ranged X-Target attack passes within your Movement range
